channel.title: Universal
channel.description:
Summary, wanna make one event universal, like when i use my meeting command it teles every player in the server to me, thats universal, i dont have my server to work with now so i want people to post how to do it so i can work with it now, because with no example idk how... How you make somehting universal, i could get it in about 15 mintues but im lazy and need to do homework, and my client got deleted so i cant do it right now neways. like i am going to make some weather stuff but i want it to be universal because i dont want it to be snowing for one person and raining for their freind 5 feet away...its sumthin like a loop through all players maybe?
on a side note can someone please explain to me how the server knows how to handle commands? i bactracked it a little and all i found was a small like 1 line void that sets another variable, and that variable isnt in any other file... i dont get how it knows how to handle it.
probly repeated myself sorry bout wasting space lol

item.title: Universal
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

Hmmm, try looking at the PlayerHandler.messageToAll code, it may give you clues.

Read full topic
